QuestData.Title: All Natural
QuestData.Description: So you have a smuggler's den, huh?$B$BI'd love to trade with ya, toots, I really would, but my laser cannon isn't even functional right now.$B$BI'll tell you what. See all the ancients around here? They got toasted good by the arakkoa's weapon, and they're practically walking piles of charcoal.$B$BBring me some charcoal to power this thing and you've got a deal.
QuestData.RewardText: That ought to do it! Nice work.
